major_findings.title: Test coverage estimated at 8%
major_findings.recommendation: Add unit tests for core modules

major_findings.title: Unenforced Foreign Key: 'organizations.tax_id'
major_findings.description: Column 'tax_id' suggests a relation but has no FK constraint.
major_findings.recommendation: Add FOREIGN KEY constraint for tax_id

major_findings.title: Unenforced Foreign Key: 'departments.plant_id'
major_findings.description: Column 'plant_id' suggests a relation but has no FK constraint.
major_findings.recommendation: Add FOREIGN KEY constraint for plant_id

major_findings.title: Unenforced Foreign Key: 'grades.employment_level_id'
major_findings.description: Column 'employment_level_id' suggests a relation but has no FK constraint.
major_findings.recommendation: Add FOREIGN KEY constraint for employment_level_id

major_findings.title: Unenforced Foreign Key: 'positions.designation_id'
major_findings.description: Column 'designation_id' suggests a relation but has no FK constraint.
major_findings.recommendation: Add FOREIGN KEY constraint for designation_id

major_findings.title: 12 components lack accessibility attributes
major_findings.description: Missing aria-labels, alt text, or other a11y features
major_findings.recommendation: Add ARIA labels and alt text to improve accessibility

major_findings.title: Insufficient input validation on AI calls
major_findings.description: Not all AI integrations validate input data (7/54)
major_findings.recommendation: Add schema validation before sending data to AI models

major_findings.title: Unsafe AI Temperature Settings
major_findings.description: Found 53 AI calls without explicit low-temperature settings (risk of hallucinations).

major_findings.title: Missing Grounding Instructions
major_findings.description: Found 53 AI prompts without grounding constraints.
major_findings.recommendation: Include 'only use provided context' or similar constraints in prompts.

major_findings.title: Missing Response Validation
major_findings.description: Found 49 AI calls without response validation.
major_findings.recommendation: Implement schema validation or parsing for AI outputs to catch malformed responses.

major_findings.title: Insufficient Fallback Behavior
major_findings.description: Less than 50% of AI calls have fallback logic (0/54).
major_findings.recommendation: Implement graceful degradation with default responses when AI calls fail.

major_findings.title: Large Asset Detected: logo.png
major_findings.recommendation: Compress image or use Next.js Image Optimization

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'organizations'
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'system_flags'
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'notification_settings'
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'employees'
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'payroll_settings'
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: No explicit API versioning
minor_findings.description: Endpoints do not use /v1/ or similar prefixes.

minor_findings.title: Incomplete AI error handling
minor_findings.description: Some AI calls lack proper error handling (17/54)
minor_findings.recommendation: Wrap AI calls in try-catch with fallback logic

minor_findings.title: Missing Security Policy
minor_findings.recommendation: Add a SECURITY.md to define reporting procedures.

minor_findings.title: Undocumented Module: org-setup
minor_findings.description: No ADR or architectural documentation found for the 'org-setup' module.
minor_findings.recommendation: Create an ADR summarizing the module's purpose and key decisions.

action_plan.issue: Insufficient input validation on AI calls
